title: Science Practice-Based Inquiry Activity Design: Phenomenon-Data-Explanation Model Integrated Teaching Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Education Theories, Elementary Curriculum Understanding, and Basic Online Learning Platform Proficiency
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing science inquiry practice linked to mathematics for pre-service/in-service elementary teachers, utilizing asynchronous learning environments with digital devices (laptops/tablets)

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can design inquiry activities that systematically connect phenomena-data-explanation models.
Learners can explain the integration of the "Planning and Carrying Out Investigations" element among the NGSS 8 science practices with mathematical problem-solving processes.
Teachers can propose three or more evidence-based explanation model development activities suitable for elementary school students.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
